FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING MARK PENULIAR CASTILLO AND RICHARD CABUAY MACAPULAY OF THE TARLAC STATE UNIVERSITY (TSU) FOR TOPPING THE SEPTEMBER 2016 LICENSURE EXAMINATIONS FOR TEACHERS (LET) IN THE ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY LEVELS, RESPECTIVELY, AND COMMENDING THE TSU FOR PROVIDING EXEMPLARY INSTRUCTION AND ACADEMIC TRAINING TO ITS STUDENTS IN THE FIELD OF TEACHER EDUCATION
